,Prescription and Illicit Drug Abuse
What are the treatments for Prescription and Illicit Drug Abuse ?,"The first step in a substance treatment program is often detoxification (detox), the process of allowing the body to get rid of the substance. Detoxification under medical supervision allows the symptoms of withdrawal to be treated, but is not addiction treatment in and of itself.
